name: Little Shoe Designer - Fashion World
description:
Design your own shoes for girls and be a model fashion designer. High heels for every beauty that loves clothes and dress up games.

Be the stylist in all fashion designer games and craft the most beauty high heels. Sell them in the shop to the fashion girls and get a good name as little shoe designer. Summer is coming, so the shoes are open now. Place to be for all the beauties and models, so there’s work to do for you as a stylist! Will you dress up the high heels?

Features of Little Shoe Designer - Fashion World?
⬪ Place to be for fashion girls
⬪ Help a beauty model with new shoes
⬪ Design your own shoes as a clothes stylist
⬪ Play the best fashion designer games
⬪ Sell shoes with the cash register and dress up at home
⬪ Cleanup the shop before customers come up

Cleanup your little shoe designer shop before customers come in. Remove clothes from the floor and use the vacuum cleaner for spots. Cleaning this store is great, because the high heels look even better!

Fashion girls are on their way now, your job as a stylist will start soon. Craft beauty shoes and put decoration on it to finish them. Sell the high heels with the cash register to pay and be famous star. Let’s design your own shoes in our fashion designer games!
